video.title: Extreme Homes Collection
video.synopsis: Visit homes shaped like snakes and UFOs, or nestled in caves and trees, in this series that reveals the world's most delightfully odd houses.

episodes.synopsis: Touch down in a Death Valley home that hovers over the desert, a Japanese house wrapped in glass and a South African residence built like a beehive.
episodes.title: Fishbowl, Beehive, Piano

episodes.synopsis: Tour a sci-fi inspired house in New York, a Hawaiian house that hovers in midair, a portable home in Austria and other unusual dwellings.
episodes.title: Pod House, Shell, Nomad Cube

episodes.synopsis: Get an up-close look into some of the world's most unusual dwellings, including a tree house that resembles an eyeball.
episodes.title: Spinning Top, Pirate, Treehouse

episodes.synopsis: Step inside homes inspired by freeway overpasses, banana leaves, scorpions, children's building blocks and other unusual influences.
episodes.title: Rolling Dice, Scorpion, Bunker

episodes.synopsis: Get a glimpse of some of the world's most unusual dwellings, including a giant erector set of a home in Argentina and an upside-down house in Brazil.
episodes.title: Upside Down, Wave, Spaceship

episodes.synopsis: See homes inspired by snakes, the letter K and the board game Monopoly, plus a Laguna Beach residence outfitted with a car elevator.
episodes.title: Cliffhanger, Pod, Hammock

episodes.synopsis: This assortment of amazing residences includes a mansion with 16 security guards, a flashlight-shaped home and an apartment with a hole in the center.
episodes.title: Flashlight, Triangles, Holes

episodes.synopsis: Tour a Japanese residence shaped like a staircase, a glass house in Oakland and a pyramid home that tops a Seattle skyscraper.
episodes.title: Bridge, Wedge, Cloud

episodes.synopsis: Visit an English mansion fit for a rock star, a dwelling in Scotland built from ruins, a floating South African home and other remarkable residences.
episodes.title: Greenhouse, Nest, Secret Agent

episodes.synopsis: See amazing homes from around the world that feature an M.C. Escher-inspired staircase, an indoor pond and marble floors imported from the Vatican.
episodes.title: Pyramid, Dream, Cliffhanger

episodes.synopsis: This assortment of spectacular homes includes a Swiss residence straight out of a fairy tale and a houseboat flying high in London.
episodes.title: Yoga, Ocean Liner, Fossils

episodes.synopsis: Check out an assortment of homes outfitted with oddball touches, including a canal, a floating putting green and an invisibility cloak.
episodes.title: Alien, Egg, Tattoo

episodes.synopsis: Visit a South African tree house that gives residents a view of giraffes and a California home that rotates to follow the sun.
episodes.title: Cartoon, Chateau, Bottles

episodes.synopsis: See a 16-level tree house in Canada, a geodesic dome home in New York, a Belgian residence shaped like a giant teepee and more.
episodes.title: Dragon, Spaceship, Teepee

episodes.synopsis: Take a peek into homes that fulfill fantasies, including a floating London pad and a Massachusetts residence that mimics an airplane.
episodes.title: Mystery, Mosaic, Fantasy
